sub_title: Multilingual Professional | Learning Development Coordinator | Project and Sales Management in Travel Industry | Hospitality Expertise | Seeking New Opportunities
summary:
In my most recent role, I am fulfilling the position of a Coordinator for the implementation of a Learning and Development platform for SKIM. This project concludes in August 2023.

Before that, I worked as a Sales Project Manager in the Travel industry, where I successfully managed and executed various projects. The combination of my previous experiences has contributed to the development and refinement of both my soft and hard skills. Also, I am fluent in multiple languages.
++++++
I am now actively seeking new challenges and opportunities. I am particularly interested in exploring roles that offer a hybrid or remote setup.
